title: Spacious Modern Family Home in Welcoming Żoliborz
description: Discover comfort and style in this beautifully maintained 5-bedroom house in sought-after Żoliborz, Warsaw. With a generous 245 sqm of living space, the residence offers three modern bathrooms, a chef’s kitchen equipped for any culinary adventure, hardwood floors, and bright, sunlit rooms throughout. The automated gate ensures privacy and security, while meticulously landscaped surroundings create a serene oasis for family life. Perfect for living and working in harmony, the home features a dedicated laundry room and an opulent ensuite in the master bedroom.
neighborhood_description: Żoliborz is renowned for its pet-friendly green spaces and expansive cycling network, making it a delight for active families and animal lovers. The neighborhood provides easy access to public transport and the highway, offering swift city commutes and weekend trips out of town. Trendy cafés, highly-rated schools, local parks, and business hubs are just minutes away, enriching your lifestyle on every level.
lifestyle_benefits: space and privacy for a growing family
target_buyer: Ideal for families with children and entrepreneurs seeking a high-quality, secure, and well-connected home with functional spaces for both living and remote working.
market_positioning: This rare house in the heart of Żoliborz blends city-life convenience with peaceful residential comfort, positioning itself as an outstanding option for professionals and families striving to balance work and lifestyle near multifaceted city amenities.
